attributes.action: Cut the EU Budget and keep the UK rebate
attributes.additional_details:
To petition the Government to vote to reduce the European Union's budget during: (a) the current budget discussions for 2012, (b) the 2013 budget discussions and (c) the EU's Multiannual Financial Framework 2014-2020 budget discussions; and to petition the Government to maintain the UK rebate.

The European Union wants to increase its budget at our expense and cut or abolish our rebate. It is time the Government put Britain first said 'No' by voting at all times to cut the EU budget and keep our rebate.
